tool_description: Analyzes kitchen traffic patterns and circulation to identify bottlenecks and optimize movement efficiency.

entry_points.description: Kitchen entry/exit point coordinates as [x,y] pairs

island_length.description: Island length in inches if present

error_messages: Invalid entry points: Entry points must be specified as coordinate pairs.
Island dimension mismatch: Island length required when island_present is true.
Insufficient clearance: Traffic paths do not meet minimum width requirements.
Circulation conflict: Multiple traffic patterns create movement bottlenecks.
usage: Input kitchen entry points and major features to analyze traffic flow patterns and receive recommendations for improving circulation.

primary_pathway.description: Description of main traffic route through kitchen

bottleneck_areas.description: Areas where traffic congestion may occur

clearance_violations.description: Locations not meeting minimum clearance requirements
